name: Raid on New York
overview: The historically inaccurate plot of the game is that you are the last Kamikaze on which rests Japan's hopes. You mission is to destroy New York. You plane was hit during the attack on Pearl Harbor and you are losing altitude. You must flatten the skyscrapers in order to land, fix your plane and fly again to restart your assault on new areas. To drop bombs, hit the space bar.
